rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Verandah
rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with a covered veranda, designed to accommodate joint family gatherings. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living room featuring floor-to-ceiling glass walls that overlook the garden, designed to evoke a sense of openness and connection with nature. Decor includes minimalist design elements true to Brutalist aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring robust concrete materials and large windows to ensure plenty of daylight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with ample storage space, designed using raw materials in keeping with Brutalist design. Windows ensure proper ventilation as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Guest room designed for occasional visitors; incorporates a small private balcony and large windows to maintain privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom on the ground floor featuring modern fixtures and efficient water usage. Aligns with local building codes and Vastu guidelines for spatial harmony.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Area designated for storage, laundry, and other utilities, designed to maintain a clean aesthetic.

openings.description: Large door with glass panels ensuring seamless transition from the outdoor veranda to indoor spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light and connect indoor space with exterior environment.
Sliding glass door connecting the kitchen to the dining area, promoting fluidity and openness.
